data.text: Wa ɠɛɛzu ma: «À ʋa, ade ɠale ma Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ʋɔ,
Folo felegɔi ʋoluma, toɠa zɛnvui ve ade ya,
Gaamazu ade leʋe ga pele goi ma zii pɛ, ade Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠwɛɛ,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠa wo wooɠaaʋotesu, é ɠɛ ma:
Tɔ ɠa é ba, gè wo loɠaai la ga GALA goo wo nuiti ta-ɠeela wooiti,
Mazɔlɔɔ wɔ̀inʋɛ ga wooɠɛɠiladai, é leʋe zalaɠaiti ba,
Kɛlɛ ʋelei Adama kɛɛni la, tiya ɓalaa ti ta-minazeɠegiti koloɠologɛ,
Galaade ɠa ga faa ɲɔu ɠɛ nuiti ta-laai,
Ʋelei toosu nuiti ta ɗa pele ɓɔungi wo da,
Gè faa ɲɔuɲɔugiti kaaʋɛ Izilayɛle ʋɛlɛyeɠei wu,
Ɗɛi ɓalaa, è ga Zuda, nà ɗɔnɔ ma molo leʋei ɠɛʋele ɓɛtɛzu,
